description.value: With the vorpal fusion, a weapon can tear between the molecules of a creature. The weapon gains the @Compendium[sfrpg.rules.O5GDQUKPCJ9Zbnfj]{Severe wound} critical hit effect (see page 182). If the weapon already has a critical hit effect, when you score a critical hit, you can apply either the weapon’s normal critical hit effect or the @Compendium[sfrpg.rules.O5GDQUKPCJ9Zbnfj]{Severe wound} effect. Only a weapon that deals bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage can benefit from this fusion.
